name: Protector of Solar System
description:
Hey! This is my first game at UE4. It still needs some work, but I hope you enjoy it now.

Control Buttons

Thrust (speed+)Space BarThrust (speed-)CtrlUpWLeftARightDDownSQuitEsc

You control a spaceship:

Purpose of the game:

  • Collect yellow balls (Energy balls)
  • Send them to Earth (just fly by Earth)

You get extra time for energy balls. When the timer reaches zero, the game will end. Share your results in the comments!

Music: Alexey Kasyanchuk (DEgITx)
